#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
long long int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
char s[10000];
cin>>s;
long long int i=0,count=0;
while(s[i]!='\0')
{
if(s[i]=='A'||s[i]=='D'||s[i]=='O'||s[i]=='P'||s[i]=='Q'||s[i]=='R')
count++;
else if(s[i]=='B')
count+=2;
i++;
}
cout<<count<<endl;
}

return 0;
}
